com.brightcove.commons.applications
Class FTPManifest

java.lang.Object
  com.brightcove.commons.system.commandLine.CommandLineProgram
      com.brightcove.commons.applications.FTPManifest

public class FTPManifest
extends com.brightcove.commons.system.commandLine.CommandLineProgram

Utility class to generate a manifest of all files on an FTP server. Includes logic to thread the list operation and retry if the request takes too long.

Author:
three4clavin

Constructor Detail

FTPManifest

public FTPManifest()

Default constructor. Not intended to be called by other classes/objects - for command line use mainly.

FTPManifest

public FTPManifest(java.lang.String serverName,
                   java.lang.String username,
                   java.lang.String password,
                   java.lang.Boolean passiveTransfer,
                   java.lang.Long manifestTimeoutMillis,
                   java.lang.String startDirectory,
                   java.util.Map<java.lang.String,com.brightcove.commons.ftp.FTPManifestEntry> manifestEntries,
                   java.lang.Boolean debug)

Constructor specifying everything except server port (assumes port 21).

Parameters:
serverName - Server host name or ip address to connect to
username - Username to connect with
password - Password to connect with
passiveTransfer - Use passive transfer mode if true instead of active
manifestTimeoutMillis - Time in milliseconds to timeout a request if it hasn't completed
startDirectory - Directory to begin listing at
manifestEntries - Map to store all entry listings on the server
debug - Verbose debugging messages on or off

username - Username to connect with
password - Password to connect with
passiveTransfer - Use passive transfer mode if true instead of active
manifestTimeoutMillis - Time in milliseconds to timeout a request if it hasn't completed
startDirectory - Directory to begin listing at
manifestEntries - Map to store all entry listings on the server
debug - Verbose debugging messages on or off

Method Detail

main

public static void main(java.lang.String[] args)

Main command line execution. This should not be called from another class/object - it is meant only as a command line bootstrap.

Accepted command line arguments:

  • --config-file: Path to config file with FTP options
  • --timeout-retries: Number of times to retry a timed out request

Parameters:
args - Command line arguments

setOutputFile

public void setOutputFile(java.lang.String outputFile)

public java.lang.String getOutputFile()

run

public void run(java.lang.String[] args)
Overrides:
run in class com.brightcove.commons.system.commandLine.CommandLineProgram

doList

public void doList()
            throws java.lang.Exception

Performs the list. Actual list is done by a background thread, so it can be killed if it runs for too long.

Throws:
java.lang.Exception - If thread is interrupted (mainly if list times out)
